title: Zerodha Clone
description: Built a full-stack Zerodha clone using the MERN stack with user authentication, dashboard, and trading-like UI for practice and learning purposes.

title: Video Conferencing
description: Developed a Zoom-like video conferencing application using the MERN stack and WebRTC. Implemented features like peer-to-peer video calling, real-time communication using sockets, and secure connection protocols. The app follows the four key stages of WebRTC: Signalling (SDP), Connecting, Securing, and Communication, offering hands-on learning with real-time media streams.
